name: Pie Jumper
description:
You are a pie, you must deliver yourself.

A hard, Jump-King-like platforming game.

Not sure if it counts against the NSFW rules but there is light cursing in my game.

Pumpkin and blueberry routes aren't available since I didn't have enough time. Also the game just restarts without warning if the other pie gets delivered first.

Click to proceed through menus and dialogue.

Spacebar and arrow keys to jump.
